title: Homo Sapien 1.0
body: <a href="http://channel9.msdn.com">Channel 9</a> <a href="http://blogs.msdn.com/onoj/archive/2004/04/06/108422.aspx">launched</a> <a href="http://blogs.msdn.com/DMassy/archive/2004/04/06/108435.aspx">today</a> and the first post I read was kinda interesting (in a geeky sort of way): <a href="http://channel9.msdn.com/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=114">The most important operating system is not Windows</a>.  <a href="http://www.microsoft.com/winme/0404/22606/Bill_Hill1_300k.asx">Here's the video</a>[asx].
